price: 74. Diggah umeynit (koros kinnuk) jahannam giráh digaalát waarta.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ فِي عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-muj'rimīna fī ʿadhābi jahannama khālidūna
